operator.name: Linear
operator.description: Tells the Interpolation function to use linear regression to supply missing measure values

operator.name: Self_After
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to return the descendants below a given level and to include the current member

operator.name: Self
operator.description: Refers the Previous function to the previous cell when it does not contain a report object

operator.name: Before
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to return the descendants above a specified level

operator.name: All
operator.description: Ignores all filters (NoFilter function) or counts all values (Count function)

operator.name: After
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to return the descendants below a specified level

operator.name: Where
operator.description: Restricts the data used to calculate a measure

operator.name: Distinct
operator.description: Tells the Count function to count distinct values only

operator.name: Between
operator.description: Determines whether a value is between two values

operator.name: Top
operator.description: Tells the Rank function to rank in descending order

operator.name: Body
operator.description: References data in a report, section or block

operator.name: Before_After
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to include all descendants except those at a given level
Multiplication operator.

operator.name: ForEach
operator.description: Adds dimensions to the calculation context

operator.name: Leaves
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to return all leaf descendants above a specified level
Addition operator.

operator.name: QuarterPeriod
operator.description: Time period in quarters.
Division operator.

operator.name: ForAll
operator.description: Removes dimensions from the calculation context
Minus operator.

operator.name: Bottom
operator.description: Tells the Rank function to rank in ascending order

operator.name: DayPeriod
operator.description: Time period in days.

operator.name: Index
operator.description: Returns the database primary key of a prompt response

operator.name: Or
operator.description: Links boolean values

operator.name: Row
operator.description: Calculates running aggregates and percentages by row
Greater Than operator.

operator.name: And
operator.description: Links boolean values
Less Than operator.

operator.name: YearPeriod
operator.description: Time period in years.

operator.name: In
operator.description: Specifies the dimensions in the calculation context

operator.name: NoNull
operator.description: Tells the Previous function to ignore null values

operator.name: Report
operator.description: References all the data in a report

operator.name: WeekPeriod
operator.description: Time period in weeks.
Greater Than Or Equal To operator.

operator.name: MonthPeriod
operator.description: Time period in months.

operator.name: IncludeEmpty
operator.description: Tells some aggregate functions to include empty values in calculations

operator.name: Block
operator.description: References the data in a block

operator.name: InList
operator.description: Determines if a value is in a list

operator.name: Drill
operator.description: Tells the NoFilter function to ignore drill filters

operator.name: Break
operator.description: Accounts for table breaks (Percentage) or references break data (extended syntax)

operator.name: Self_Before
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to return the descendants below a given level and to include the current member

operator.name: NotOnBreak
operator.description: Tells the Interpolation function to ignore section and block breaks

operator.name: Not
operator.description: Returns the opposite of a boolean value

operator.name: Section
operator.description: References the data in a section

operator.name: PointToPoint
operator.description: Tells the Interpolation function to use point-to-point interpolation to supply missing measure values
Not Equal To operator.

operator.name: Col
operator.description: Calculates running aggregates and percentages by column
Less Than Or Equal To operator.

operator.name: Self_Before_After
operator.description: Tells the Descendants function to include all descendants and the current member
